resources.string: How to take care of the elderly at home by staying in touch

If you go to school, work far away, do not live with grandparents, parents, try to spend time to contact, inquire about their health every day. This way is an invisible cable that connects people to each other. Today, life is more and more modern, with the help of technological devices: phones, smartphones, internet. Socially, you can connect with your parents easily even if you are far away. Especially if in your family there are the person who has just died, the more often you have to communicate with the rest of them so that they no longer feel abandoned and lonely.

People often think that, when they are old, they need to rest and recuperate. However, the truth is not like that.In old age, if you do not exercise regularly physically and mentally, your health will quickly decline, causing bad diseases such as bone and joint problems, weight even affecting the mind.Therefore, you should let them regularly communicate and exercise in accordance with their health status and wishes.
